text: Peterson Zah (December 2, 1937 â€“ March 7, 2023) was an American politician. He was the first President of the Navajo Nation and the last Chairman of the Navajo Nation.Peterson Zah Biography In 1995, he began working at Arizona State University as the Special Adviser to the ASU President on American Indian Affairs. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Presidents of the Navajo Nation Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Arizona State University faculty
title: Peterson Zah
